import React, { lazy,useContext,useEffect } from 'react' import { CBadge, CButton, CButtonGroup, CCard, CCardBody, CCardFooter, CCardHeader, CCol, CProgress, CRow, CCallout } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' import ProgrammeProvider from "../../context/ProgrammeContext" import AttendeeProvider from "../../context/AttendeeContext" import Paginations from "../../pagination/pagination" import SearchInput from "../../inputs/search-input" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faEye } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import MainChartExample from '../charts/MainChartExample.js' import {useParams,useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' const styles={ noBorder:{ border:"none" }, noBorderTop:{ borderBTop:"none" }, cardStyle:{ boxShadow: " 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2)", transition: "0.3s", border:"none" } } const DashboardAttendees = () => { const {setCurrentPage,fetchAttendeesApi,pagination,attandees}=useContext(AttendeeProvider.Context) useEffect(()=>{ fetchAttendeesApi() // setCurrentPage(1) //alert("mount") },[]) return ( <> All Posts | Showing Page ({attandees.length ? pagination.current_page:""}) of ({attandees.length ? pagination.total: "" }) Results { attandees.length ? attandees.map((post)=>( )):null }
Title Attendees View
{post.name}
 {post.users.length}
{/* */}
{!attandees.length &&

No articles found

} {attandees.length ? : "" } ) } export default DashboardAttendees
